title: Kamakhuwa ke bulwale bwa Korona
allTitles: {"en":"About Coronavirus","luy":"Kamakhuwa ke bulwale bwa Korona","swh":"Virusi vya Ugonjwa wa Korona"}
licenseNotes: Okhabadilisia kamakhuwa ke musitaabu sino tawe, lakini onyala wakara mululomo lulundi, khurumikhila chingila chichindi, lakini okabe bila khukusia. Sitaabu sino siandikwa nende Weiman Kou. Aana
credits: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow
summary: This book gives basic advice on dealing with the coronavirus COVID 19

14.luy: Okhoya omanye sindu silala khu bulwale bwa Korona
14.swh: Kuna jambo MOJA tu unalopaswa kuelewa juu ya jinsi virusi vya Korona
14.en: There's only ONE thing you need to understand about how a coronavirus

41.swh: Kwenda mbali. Ukiwa umbali wa mita 2 hutafikiwa na vitone vikubwa vya mate.
41.en: Keep your distance.﻿ ﻿2m will keep you safe ﻿from large droplets.

56.swh: Wape barakoa. Waweze kukoholea au kuendea chafya na kuwakinga wote walio karibu
56.en: Give them a mask.﻿ ﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby

68.luy: Bandu banyala barumikhila emaski/sitambaa mumoni nyo belinde balekhe khunyola bulwale
68.swh: Pengine yeye si mgonjwa, anajikinga tu
68.en: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

71.swh: Watu wenye virusi huenda wasionyeshe ishara zozote, lakini bado wanaweza kuvisambaza
71.en: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are stillinfectious

74.swh: Kwa jumla, ni wazo bora kuepuka umati wa watu, maana huwezi kujua kama kuna mtu mgonjwa.
74.en: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

131.swh: na njia ya kipekee iliyo bora kuviondoa ni kuviosha kwa sabuni, dawa ya klorini, au kileo.
131.en: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

155.swh: Usijiguse uso. (Au uuguse uso wa mtu mwingine yeyote.) Iwapo ni lazima ujiguse, kwanza ioshe mikono yako kabisa kwa sabuni.
155.en: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

176.swh: Iwapo umefanya hivyo, usihofu. Nawa mikono yako kwa sabuni hapo baadaye.
176.en: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

257.luy: Khu burumisi bubundi, reba erusa khucomicsforgood@gmail.com
257.en: When sharing, please remember these 3 points: ﻿1) No edits to the comics is allowed in any way when sharing. ﻿2) Comics cannot be used for any commercial project ﻿3) lf online, credit the creator on FB by tagging @weimankowart, on IG by tagging @weimankow (IG), or providing a link to instagram com/weimankow﻿For all other uses, please send a request in to: comicsforgood@gmail.com
257.swh: Wakati unapowapa wengine kijitabu hiki, tafadhali kumbuka hoja hizi 3: ﻿1) Hakuna ruhusa kuhariri chochote kwa njia yoyote unapokisambaza. ﻿2) Vibonzo hivi haviwezi kutumiwa kwa mradi wowote wa kuleta faida. ﻿3) lwapo unakisambaza kupitia kwa tovuti, weka jina la mwandalizi wa kitabu katika FB kwa kuweka @weimankowart, kwa IG kwa kuweka @weimankow (IG), au hata kuandika linki kwa instagram com/weimankow Kwa matumizi mengineyo yote, tafadhali tuma ombi kwa: comicsforgood@gmail.com
